scores.question: How to suren point system?
scores.answer: Go to 'How to play page' and find different points systems for different match formats.

scores.question: How much time it will take to get the winning money ?
scores.answer: It will take to upto 2-4hr to double check the points of the match and give out the winnings.

scores.question: Scores are wrong. Please check and update fast
scores.answer: Sometimes the points will vary based on the scores given by our provider, but be sure that we'll be double checking the Scores & points before we announce the winners.

account.question: I'm unable to upload my pan card
account.answer: Try refreshing the page and check. If the problem still persists, please brief us with the exact issue you're facing.

account.question: How can i change my team name?
account.answer: You can not change your team name once its created in the signup process

account.question: How do i change my password?
account.answer: Go to your profile and click 'Edit Profile' and find change password form on bottom.

account.question: Can I upload someone else's pan card and my bank details for verification of my Account?
account.answer: The PAN card and Bank account should belong to one person  to get verified

account.question: I want to change my bank details.
account.answer: Please send us a mail stating the reason that why you want to change your bank details and we'll get back to you to that.

account.question: I'm not getting the verification email.
account.answer: Sometimes the mails will go in to your spam folder based on the mail service you are using, so check your spam and other folders to find the mail.
